parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Lock or unlock a vehicle's inventory access. This command can also lock backpack a unit is wearing to prevent access by a third party. If you set it [[true]] (locked), the inventory won't be accessed via hotkey or action menu.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> vehicle [[lockInventory]] lock

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> lock: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[lockInventory]] [[true]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[backpackContainer]] [[player]] [[lockInventory]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lockedInventory]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- BEGIN Note Section -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 21. nov. 2020</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:PierreMGI|PierreMGI]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This command works only on alive unit. No matter you run it before or after death, on due [[backpackContainer]] unit, the backpack will be accessible on corpse.

<comment><!-- END Note Section -->
</comment></dl></root>
